alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northern Arctic Coast; Northwest Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 4:10AM AKST until January 05 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO 9 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Northwest Arctic Coast, Northern Arctic Coast, Central Beaufort Sea Coast and Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From noon Tuesday to 9 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northern Arctic Coast; Northwest Arctic Coast
